extension.name: Google Calendar
extension.author: Vitaliy Zhukov
extension.description:
Using this plugin, you can embed Google Calendar into articles simply by copying and pasting a Calendar ID video parameter between the GCalendar flags: {gcalendar}xxxxxx{/gcalendar} Then you would insert the following text to your article:
{youtube}2il882at1dto1s899g2odb4dac@group.calendar.google.com{/youtube}

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Width of Google Calendar. Default width is 800 pixels.

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Height of Google Calendar. Default height is 600 pixels.
